HELP_YOU_LOW_REPLY_1: You're lying. Why would you want to help me?
HELP_YOU_LOW_REPLY_2: What reason would you have to help me?
HELP_YOU_LOW_REPLY_3: I doubt that you want to help me. You have no reason to want too.
HELP_YOU_HIGH_REPLY_1: Well if you are here to help me, lets talk.
HELP_YOU_HIGH_REPLY_2: Okay then what can you do for me?
HELP_YOU_HIGH_REPLY_3: You're here to help huh? Well I'm all ears.
ASSERT_AUTHORITY_REPLY_1: Good, you can help me then.
ASSERT_AUTHORITY_REPLY_2: Great, how about you help me out.
ASSERT_AUTHORITY_REPLY_3: Alright in that case need you to help me.
RELEASE_All_HOSTAGES_REPLY_2: Nice try cheif but that is not going to happen.
RELEASE_All_HOSTAGES_REPLY_3: I don't see that happening. No one is going anywhere.
ASK_INTENTIONS_REPLY_1: Taking a hostage was my last resort, I didn't have any other options.
ASK_INTENTIONS_REPLY_2: I need money. Hostages bring money.
ASK_INTENTIONS_REPLY_3: I need money and I ran out of options.
ASSURE_SAFETY_LOW_REPLY_1: I don't believe you. I need to know I will not be harmed.
ASSURE_SAFETY_LOW_REPLY_2: How can I trust you? I need a 100% gurantee that you won't harm me.
ASSURE_SAFETY_LOW_REPLY_3: I don't trust you. I need your word that I won't be touched.
ASSURE_SAFETY_HIGH_REPLY_1: Are you sure? You seem honest but I have my doubts.
ASSURE_SAFETY_HIGH_REPLY_2: How can I know forsure? I do like you and trust you.
ASSURE_SAFETY_HIGH_REPLY_3: I don't know. I trust you but still am unsure.
WHOS_THERE_REPLY_1: I have a young man with me.
WHOS_THERE_REPLY_2: There is myself and a young man.
WHOS_THERE_REPLY_3: A young man is with me.
DOWNPLAY_REPLY_1: I really do not want to make this situation any worse.
DOWNPLAY_REPLY_2: I do not need for this situation to get out of control.
DOWNPLAY_REPLY_3: I do not want for this situation to get out of hand.
BACKGROUND_REPLY_1: My background is not a concern to you.
BACKGROUND_REPLY_2: That is none of your business.
BACKGROUND_REPLY_3: I am not telling you anything.
GIVE_UP_REPLY_1: Promise me that you can give me stuff and I'll come out.
GIVE_UP_REPLY_2: Okay that seems fair. I am coming out now.
GIVE_UP_REPLY_3: I'll come out as long as you give me what we agreed upon.
MAKE_OFFERING_REPLY_1: That is not what I asked for. Stop playing around.
MAKE_OFFERING_REPLY_2: That is not what I want. You must not be taking this seriously.
MAKE_OFFERING_REPLY_3: Are you joking? That's the best you can do?
WHY_MONEY_REPLY_1: I need the money to pay off bills.
WHY_MONEY_REPLY_2: I have bills that I need to pay.
OFFER_ALTERNATIVES_REPLY_1: If you can't help me then you are wasting my time.
OFFER_ALTERNATIVES_REPLY_2: What do you take me for? If you can't help me then get me someone who can.
OFFER_ALTERNATIVES_REPLY_3: Clearly I am not getting anywhere with you.
WHY_HOSTAGES_REPLY_1: I did not want this to happen. I was trying to rob the jewelry store.
WHY_HOSTAGES_REPLY_2: This was a mistake. I was robbing the jewerly store and it ended up this way.
WHY_HOSTAGES_REPLY_3: I was robbing the jewerly store and he got in my way.
VENT_REPLY_1: This situation is all messed up. I do not want anyone to get hurt.
VENT_REPLY_2: I am flustered. Everything is messed up.
VENT_REPLY_3: This is getting out of hand. I never intended it to end up like this.
MAKING_WORSE_REPLY_1: If you guys did not show up, I would not have had to take the hostage in the first place
MAKING_WORSE_REPLY_2: This is all your fault. I only took the hostage because you guys showed up.
MAKING_WORSE_REPLY_3: I would not have had to take the hostage if you guys did not role up trying to be heros.
WHAT_BILLS_REPLY_1: I have medical bills that need to be payed.
REFUSAL_REPLY_2: Why can't you give me what I want?
WHY_HAVE_MEDICAL_REPLY_1: My wife was in the hospital.
EMPATHY_TREE_REPLY_3: It is not easy having her not around.
EMPATHY_REPLY_1: You do not understand how I feel.
EMPATHY_REPLY_2: Stop acting like you know what I am going through.
EMPATHY_REPLY_3: You have no idea how this feels.
HAD_CANCER_REPLY_1: Yes, she had cancer, she did not make it.
HAD_CANCER_REPLY_2: Yes, she is no longer with us.
OTHER_REPLY_3: Are you trying to be cute? Cut the crap.
START_SCENARIO: Situation report: Single man sitting in a jewelry store. Armed status unknown. Hostage status unknown. Proceed with caution!

HOW_DO_YOU_WANT_MONEY_REPLY_3: What kind of question is that? I want it cash.
MOVE_REPLY_2: Sorry bud, I am not going anywhere.
HOW_MUCH_TAKEN_REPLY_1: Why would it matter have I taken?
HOW_MUCH_TAKEN_REPLY_2: I have taken only as much as I need.
GREETINGS_REPLY_3: Get out of here you pig.
SHE_NO_WANT_REPLY_1: You're right man, I shouldn't be doing this. I'll come out.
SHE_NO_WANT_REPLY_2: I am not doing this for you. I am coming out for her.
SHE_NO_WANT_REPLY_3: Okay okay for her. I'm coming out for her.
THREATEN_REPLY_2: Your scare tatics won't work on me.
THREATEN_REPLY_3: You can't intimidate someone that has nothing to lose.
HOW_ARE_YOU_REPLY_1: What does it look like? I'm not doing well.
HOW_ARE_YOU_REPLY_2: Well I am in this mess. How would you think I am doing?
HOW_ARE_YOU_REPLY_3: Right now is not the time for small talk.
WHAT_IS_GOING_ON_REPLY_1: I have taken this person hostage, leave me alone.
WHAT_IS_GOING_ON_REPLY_2: I have a hostage. Back off and noone gets hurt.
